title: Free True Soul Nere
content:
oned that a deep gnome fled with some, and to ask her crew (who are digging near the collapse) to know more. They can tell you where to find Smokepowder. Additionally, if you find the Hand-drawn Map in Grymforge (X:-538 Y:465) the quest objective will update.

You can find Philomeen at the coordinates X: -527 Y: 464 but it is adviced that you save the game before reaching this zone because any wrong decisions may wipe the entire party. Your conversation with Philomeen may be tricky, you should t
